Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{3: "The structure of the Demon King's Castle wasn't too different from the previous ones. Before arriving at the center, we had to go through corridors with lots of traps."}
{3: 'Just when we defeated the guards and started heading further inside the castle, Kamui triggered the traps. He never let us down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Can't you check the surroundings before you move?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, watch out!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dodge them.', 3: '12', 4: 'Take out recovery potions.', 5: '15'}
{3: "The attacks launched by the traps that Kamui triggered came right at me. Thanks to Lucia's warning, I was able to dodge some of them."}
{3: 'Lucia helped to destroy the remaining attacks. I was safe, at least temporarily.'}

{3: "The attacks launched by the traps that Kamui triggered came right at me, but I didn't feel like dodging them at all. Instead, I remembered what Camu taught me and took out potions from the bag."}
{3: 'The damage of the traps was easily mitigated by the healing.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'How many times have you done this, Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Speaking of which, did you purposely send the artifact to them? I still don't quite understand your plan, but you shouldn't keep it from me!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We had no plan to keep it from you. The explanation was omitted because we thought everyone could easily understand. ', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But I only learned about it just now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'You are an unexpected factor. Luckily, Camu knows your moves. Otherwise the plan will be all messed up.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I didn't expect him to know me so well either.", 4: '1'}
{2: "He's always watching you, isn't he?", 3: '30', 4: "Don't you share the same body?", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "True. That's how he learned all the game knowledge...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'True. We share the same frame, of course he knows my habit.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Anyway, Kamui will slow the team down walking in front. Lee, you go to the front, and we will follow you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'This is the so-called altar. Can I give you all the artifact now, King?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Correct. Oh, please also move the Holy Maiden onto the altar.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...King, do you have to destroy this world for your own dream?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Hah, of course. And you can't say no right now!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Following the King's order, Liv's black bracelet gave a shimmering light. Her hands were automatically lifted, and the artifact fragments started to merge."}
{2: 'King', 3: "Great, I was worried that it might not work on heroes. After all, it's a cheating item made from modified bottom layer code.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The altar started to shine.'}
